animation.condition: [Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]

onleft.condition: ![Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]

Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)

item.visible: ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Skin.String(SectionType,shared)]

control.visible: [ControlGroup(200).HasFocus | [Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Skin.String(SectionType,playqueue) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(seasons) | [Container.PlexContent(Episodes) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(primaryFilterActivated))] | [Container.PlexContent(Albums) + IsEmpty(Container.Property(PlexFilter))] | Container.Content(songs) | Container.PlexContent(photoalbums)]] + !ControlGroup(1130).HasFocus + !ControlGroup(1132).HasFocus + !ControlGroup(300).HasFocus

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(50) + ![Skin.String(SectionType,shared) | Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(photos)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(51) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ColouredCircles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(57) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ColouredCircles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]

control.description: Change Small Icons Watched Status Colour
control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
$LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: [Control.IsVisible(500) | Control.IsVisible(511)] + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ColouredCircles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs) | Container.Content(photos)]

control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(503) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ColouredCircles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]

control.description: Change Fullscreen Wall Watched Status Colour
control.label: $LOCALIZE[42311]
control.visible: Control.IsVisible(609) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.Circles) + Skin.HasSetting(Enable.ColouredCircles) + ![Container.PlexContent(channels) | Container.PlexContent(channel) | Container.Content(artists) | Container.Content(albums) | Container.Content(songs)]
